price: 59.Nabii Mucammadow: faatoo kee fayla Yalli leeh isi naqoosay (kay farmoytit kinnuk) isi farmoh dooritel nagaynan kaak yanay, tohuk lakal A-korosey Yalli yayse innaa, hinnay Yallat agleh haan numtinwwellittey usun yaqbudeeni tayseeh keenik ixxic? (Yalli yayse).
arabic: قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ أَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: quli al-ḥamdu lillahi wasalāmun ʿalā ʿibādihi alladhīna iṣ'ṭafā āllahu khayrun ammā yush'rikūna
